event: Early Preclassic period begins - earliest Maya settlements
commit_message: Initial commit: Early Maya settlements and agriculture

event: Development of ceremonial centers and monumental architecture
commit_message: Feature: First ceremonial centers and religious architecture

event: Late Preclassic period - rise of complex societies
commit_message: Release: Complex societies and early hieroglyphic writing

event: Beginning of Classic period - major city-states emerge
commit_message: Major release: Classic period begins, major city-states rise

event: Arrival of Teotihuacan-influenced dynasty in Tikal
commit_message: Feature: Political changes with Teotihuacan influence

event: Classic period peak - Tikal, Calakmul, Copan at height
commit_message: Release: Golden age of Maya civilization

event: Defeat of Copan ruler 18-Rabbit by Quirigua
commit_message: Security breach: Major political upheaval in Copan

event: Calakmul defeated by Tikal in decisive battle
commit_message: Major event: Shift in power balance between major city-states

event: Classic Maya collapse - abandonment of many southern lowland centers
commit_message: Critical: Collapse of southern lowland centers
Breaking change: Northern Yucatan centers influenced by Toltecs

event: Postclassic period - Maya states like Mayapan dominate
commit_message: Fork: Postclassic period with new political arrangements
End of life: Spanish conquest ends independent Maya civilization
